member.name: M:AudioController.Start
member.summary: Get the audio file to play.

member.name: M:AudioController.reset
member.summary: Reset the audio to the beginning.

member.name: M:AudioController.move
member.summary: Not supported method for audio controller class.

member.name: M:AudioController.stop
member.summary: Stop the sound of audio file.

member.name: M:BackgroundController.Start
member.summary: Set the variable for beginning of the game start, rigidBody variable that enables physical behaviour for a GameObject, player is variable get player object that find the player script , startPos is variable to set position of background.

member.name: M:BackgroundController.FixedUpdate
member.summary: This method is always run once per frame for game, For set the velocity of the background to 10 which mean the speed of the background is 10. This means the velocity affect only with the x so only move constant to right, but when dead the velocity change to zero

member.name: M:BackgroundController.move
member.summary: This method is generate the move of the background.

member.name: M:BackgroundController.reset
member.summary: Reset the position of background controller.

member.name: M:BorderController.move
member.summary: This method is move the border to constantly to the right.

member.name: M:BorderController.reset
member.summary: Reset the position of border controller.

member.name: M:BorderController.Start
member.summary: Generate the position of border.

member.name: M:CameraController.Start
member.summary: Generate the first of the game view, the view is depend on the player object and the following of it's position.

member.name: M:CameraController.Update
member.summary: Change the view to last player position.

member.name: M:DeathMenu.Start
member.summary: Find the sricpt of audio controller.

member.name: M:DeathMenu.RestartGame
member.summary: Restart the game to the beginning.

member.name: M:FlyingObstacleController.Start
member.summary: Generate the position of flying obstacle, to the random position in range -5 until 10 of x position, and so the y position of flying obstacle.

member.name: M:FlyingObstacleController.reset
member.summary: Reset the position of flying obstacle.

member.name: M:FlyingObstacleController.move
member.summary: Generate the random position flying obstacle when touch the destroy collider.

member.name: M:FlyingObstacleController.random
member.summary: Random method called when position of y so didn't take to close of ground obstacles.
member.returns: The value of random the y position.

member.name: M:GameManager.Start
member.summary: Find the script of game object controller.

member.name: M:GameManager.RestartGame
member.summary: This method is calling death screen from class DeathMenu, so we can't move again.

member.name: M:GameManager.Reset
member.summary: This method is calling death screen from class DeathMenu, so when the player died the variable set to false then the position is restart, the restart is affect to background and all other object to beginning again.

member.name: M:GameObjectController.reset
member.summary: Reset method.

member.name: M:GameObjectController.move
member.summary: Move method.

member.name: M:GroundObstacleController.Start
member.summary: Generate the position of ground obstacles, to the random position in range -10 until 10 of x position, and so the y position of ground obstacles is not random because ground obstacles are not flying. And in this method we have random ground obstacles. The random will choose the stone or bushes, so didn't respawn both.

member.name: M:GroundObstacleController.reset
member.summary: Reset the position of ground obstacles.

member.name: M:GroundObstacleController.move
member.summary: Generate the random position ground obstacles when touch the destroy collider.

member.name: M:GroundObstacleController.changeToSemak
member.summary: Get the script of bushes then generate the x position and same with script of box collider.

member.name: M:GroundObstacleController.changeToBatu
member.summary: Get the script of stone then generate the x position and same with script of box collider.

member.name: M:InGameMenu.QuitToMain
member.summary: Select the main menu of game.

member.name: M:InGameMenu.RestartGame
member.summary: Set game to restart to the beginning of the game.

member.name: M:InitialMenu.Start
member.summary: Set the menu to set scene for hint game.

member.name: M:InitialMenu.Update
member.summary: Set the game on, so that menu goes off.

member.name: M:MainMenu.PlayGame
member.summary: Start the game.

member.name: M:MainMenu.QuitGame
member.summary: Quit the game.

member.summary: Set the position object with posistion of x.
member.param: Parameter input data for change the x with float data type.

member.name: M:PauseMenu.PauseGame
member.summary: Pause the game show the scene of pause so set the character unable to move.

member.name: M:PauseMenu.ResumeGame
member.summary: Resume the game so set the character to can move again then remove the pause scene.

member.name: M:PauseMenu.RestartGame
member.summary: Restart the game to the beginning again then remove the pause scene.

member.name: M:PauseMenu.QuitToMain
member.summary: Exit to the main menu, then show the menu of the game.

member.name: M:PlayerController.Start
member.summary: rigidBody is variable to get script of the Rigidbody2D collider is variable to get script of the Collider2D animator is variable to get script of the Animator isDead is variable set when die startPos is variable to get position of beginning

member.name: M:PlayerController.FixedUpdate
member.summary: This method set when die then restart the game, and set when press space our character fly have the speed of character(movement), set the score, then character set to always run to the front.

member.name: M:PlayerController.jump
member.summary: Set the character to jump.

member.name: M:PlayerController.run
member.summary: Move the character.

member.name: M:PlayerController.fly
member.summary: Set the character to fly.

member.name: M:PlayerController.OnCollisionEnter2D(UnityEngine.Collision2D)
member.summary: Set the animation of character to die when touch the obstacles, and we have the GodMode so didn't take this method.
member.param: The variable input for other collider.

member.name: M:PlayerController.move
member.summary: Encapsulate the method of run so we can call this method enough for set the character to move.

member.name: M:PlayerController.reset
member.summary: Reset the position of all object and effect.

member.name: M:PlayerController.god
member.summary: Active the GodMode for invurnable to die when touch the obstacles.

member.name: M:ScoreManager.Start
member.summary: Set the score to zero and the high score with the highest score at before play.

member.name: M:ScoreManager.Update
member.summary: Always set the score always going advanced and matching with the move of character.

member.name: M:ScoreManager.OnDestroy
member.summary: Set the score to the high score.
